name: Pixel Rainbows
description:
WARNING: This game can ruin friendships

Pixel Rainbow is a co-op tetris clone game with these simple rules:

1) every player controls a tetromino

2) the players have 5 lives in total

3) a tetromino needs to be placed in a position where it has at least one adjacent block of the same color . If this condition is not satisfied when a tetromino is placed, all players lose 1 life.

4) if a tetromino is placed so that at least one block is at the first row, the players don't lose one life even if there isn't an adjacent block of the same colour.

---------------------------------------------------------

It's highly recommended to play this game with another person.
